words.en: By the ones sent forth||one after another
And the ones that scatter||far and wide
And those who separate||(by the) Criterion
And those who bring down||(the) Reminder
Indeed what||you are promised||will surely occur
And when||the Messengers||are gathered to their appointed time
And what||will make you know||what||(is the) Day||(of) the Judgment

words.id: kecelakaan||pada hari itu||bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan

words.en: Then||We follow them up||(with) the later ones

words.en: So We measured||and Best||(are We to) measure!

words.en: And We made||therein||firmly set mountains||lofty||and We gave you to drink||water||sweet

translations.text: Wa-ja'alnaa feehaa rawaasiya shaamikhaatinw Wa-asqainaakum maaa'an furaataa
